Class ResistanceEffect

java.lang.Object
sk.stuba.fiit.effects.Effect
sk.stuba.fiit.effects.ResistanceEffect
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Tickable
public class ResistanceEffect extends Effect
Represents a resistance effect that provides the player with a chance to block incoming damage. The block chance is determined by the effect's level (10% per level). This effect replaces the player's current TakingDamageStrategy with a ResistanceTakingDamageStrategy. When removed, it restores the original strategy.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ResistanceEffect

      public ResistanceEffect(int level, boolean isFinite, float duration, float remainingTime, Entity target)
      Constructs a new ResistanceEffect.
      Parameters:
      level - the level of resistance, each level gives +10% chance to block damage
      isFinite - whether the effect has a limited duration
      duration - the total duration of the effect
      remainingTime - the initial remaining time before expiration
      target - the entity to which the effect is applied

  • Method Details

    • clone

      public Effect clone()
      Creates a copy of this ResistanceEffect with the same level, duration, and time left. Note: the cloned effect will have no target set.
      Specified by:
      clone in class Effect
      Returns:
      a cloned instance of this effect

    • applyEffect

      public void applyEffect()
      Applies the resistance effect to the player by modifying their damage-taking strategy. Stores the current strategy to allow restoration later.
      Specified by:
      applyEffect in class Effect

    • removeEffect

      public void removeEffect()
      Removes the resistance effect and restores the player's original damage-taking strategy.
